screen -s K1D masscan -nmap --retries=1 --open --max-rate=50000 -iL ov.txt -oL masscanoutputMAX.txt --ports 9000,9001,1000,1001,10000-10020,20000-20010,30000-30010,40000-40010,22222,11111,33333,44444,55555,65535,25500-25599,25600-25699,25730-25750
screen -s K1D java -jar masscancheck.jar masscanoutputk1d.txt 100 | tee 'checkk1d.txt'
java -jar qChecker.jar checkk1d.txt | tee 'checkedK1D.txt'
cat checkedK1D.txt | grep -ai "SUCCESS"

screen -s K1D masscan -nmap --wait 1 --retries=1 --open --max-rate=50000 -iL ov.txt -oL maxthonx.txt --ports 1-9,300-320,1000-1020,2000-2020,3000-3020,7000-7020,8000-8020,10000-10100,20000-20050,21000-21050,22000-22050,23000-23050,24000-24050,25200-25800,30000-30050,55000-55050,60000-60011,65500-65535


screen -s K1D masscan -nmap --wait 1 --retries=1 --open --max-rate=50000 -iL ov.txt -oL maxthonx.txt --ports 1-65535

screen -s K1D masscan -nmap --wait 1 --retries=1 --open --max-rate=100000 -iL ov.txt -oL maxthonx.txt --ports 1-9,12-17,100-120,200-220,300-320,400-420,500-520,600-620,700-720,800-820,900-920,1000-1020,2000-2020,3000-3020,4000-4020,5000-5020,6000-6020,7000-7020,8000-8020,8100-8120,9000-9020,10000-10100,11000-11100,12000-12100,13000-13100,14000-14100,15000-15100,16000-16100,17000-17100,18000-18100,19000-19100,20000-20300,21000-21100,22000-22100,23000-23100,24000-24100,25000-30000,31000-31100,32000-32100,33000-33100,34000-34100,35000-35100,36000-36100,37000-37100,38000-38100,39000-39100,40000-40500,41000-41100,42000-42100,43000-43100,44000-44100,45000-45100,46000-46100,47000-47100,48000-48100,49000-49300,50000-50400,51000-51100,52000-52100,53000-53100,54000-54100,55000-55100,56000-56100,57000-57100,58000-58100,59000-59100,60000-60300,61000-61100,62000-62100,63000-63100,64000-64100,65000-65535
